
{{alias}}( x, lambda )
    Computes Box-Cox transformation

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        Input value.

    lambda: number
       Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    b: number
        Function value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 1, 2.5 )
    0.0
    
    > v = {{alias}}( 4, 2.5 )
    12.4
    
    > v = {{alias}}( 10, 2.5 )
    126.09110640673529
    
    > v = {{alias}}( 2, 0 )
    0.6931471805599453
    
    > v = {{alias}}( -1, 2.5 )
    NaN
    
    > v = {{alias}}( 0, -1 )
    -Infinity
    
    See Also
    --------
